issues.title: [Pipeline] Scaffold Express + TypeScript Project
issues.body:
## Description
Set up the initial project structure for the Code Snippet Manager using Express.js and TypeScript. This includes static file serving, a health check endpoint, and basic project configuration for development and testing.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] package.json with express, typescript, vitest, tsx, `@types/express`
- [ ] tsconfig.json targeting ES2022 with strict mode
- [ ] src/app.ts with Express app, JSON body parser, static file serving from public/
- [ ] src/server.ts listening on PORT env var (default 3000)
- [ ] GET /health returns { status: "ok", timestamp: ISO string }
- [ ] public/ directory with placeholder index.html
- [ ] npm scripts: "dev" (tsx watch), "build" (tsc), "test" (vitest)
- [ ] Tests for the health endpoint

## Dependencies
None

## Technical Notes
- Use Express.js and TypeScript
- Place all source files in src/
- Use public/ for static assets
- Use Vitest for testing
- Use tsx for dev server
- Health endpoint: GET /health
- Example file structure:
  - src/app.ts
  - src/server.ts
  - public/index.html
  - package.json
  - tsconfig.json
  - vitest.config.ts
Related to #6




> Generated by [PRD Decomposer](https://github.com/samuelkahessay/agentic-pipeline/actions/runs/22384288750) for issue #6

issues.title: [Pipeline] Build Web UI: Snippet List & Dashboard
issues.body:
## Description
Create the main web UI for listing all snippets, filtering by language/tag, and searching. Implement a clean, responsive layout with modern styling and client-side filtering.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] public/index.html ‚Äî clean, responsive layout with header, sidebar, main content area
- [ ] public/css/style.css ‚Äî modern styling (CSS variables for theming, card-based layout, monospace for code)
- [ ] public/js/app.js ‚Äî client-side JavaScript (no framework)
- [ ] Displays all snippets as cards with: title, language badge, first 4 lines of code preview, tags as chips, relative timestamp
- [ ] Sidebar shows language filter list and tag cloud
- [ ] Clicking a language or tag filters the list (client-side fetch to API)
- [ ] Search bar at top with debounced search (calls /api/snippets/search)
- [ ] "New Snippet" button in header
- [ ] Works on mobile (responsive breakpoints)

## Dependencies
Depends on #11

## Technical Notes
- Use only plain HTML, CSS, JS (no frameworks)
- Use fetch API for all data
- Use highlight.js via CDN for code highlighting
- Place files in public/

issues.title: [Pipeline] Build Web UI: Snippet Detail, Create & Edit Pages
issues.body:
## Description
Implement the web UI for viewing, creating, and editing snippets. Support syntax highlighting, copy-to-clipboard, and form validation for required fields.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] public/snippet.html ‚Äî full snippet view page
- [ ] Displays: title, language, full code block with syntax highlighting (highlight.js via CDN), description rendered, tags as clickable chips, created/updated timestamps
- [ ] "Copy Code" button that copies snippet to clipboard
- [ ] "Edit" and "Delete" buttons
- [ ] public/edit.html ‚Äî create/edit form page
- [ ] Form fields: title (text), language (dropdown with common languages), code (textarea with monospace font and tab support), description (textarea), tags (comma-separated input)
- [ ] Form validates required fields (title, code) client-side before submit
- [ ] Submits to API via fetch, redirects to snippet view on success
- [ ] Works for both create (POST) and edit (PUT) based on URL parameter

## Dependencies
Depends on #8

## Technical Notes
- Use only plain HTML, CSS, JS (no frameworks)
- Use fetch API for all data
- Use highlight.js via CDN for code highlighting
- Place files in public/
Related to #8

issues.title: [Pipeline] Implement Snippet Data Model & In-Memory Store
issues.body:
## Description
Create the data layer for managing code snippets, including a TypeScript interface and an in-memory store with all required methods. This will serve as the backend data source for all snippet operations.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] src/models/snippet.ts with Snippet interface: { id, title, code, language, description, tags: string[], createdAt, updatedAt }
- [ ] src/store/snippet-store.ts with SnippetStore class using Map
- [ ] Methods: create, getById, getAll, update, delete, searchByText, filterByTag, filterByLanguage
- [ ] UUID generation for IDs (use crypto.randomUUID)
- [ ] Timestamps auto-set on create/update
- [ ] Unit tests for all store methods including edge cases

## Dependencies
Depends on #7

## Technical Notes
- Use TypeScript strict mode
- Store snippets in a Map(string, Snippet)
- Implement all methods as described
- Place model in src/models/snippet.ts
- Place store in src/store/snippet-store.ts
- Use Vitest for unit tests
Related to #7

issues.title: [Pipeline] Add Tag Management API Endpoints
issues.body:
## Description
Implement API endpoints for listing all unique tags with snippet counts and retrieving all snippets for a given tag. Ensure tags are normalized and deduplicated on save.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] GET /api/tags ‚Äî returns all unique tags with snippet counts: { tags: [{ name, count }] }
- [ ] GET /api/tags/:tag/snippets ‚Äî returns all snippets with that tag
- [ ] Tags are normalized to lowercase, trimmed, duplicates removed on save
- [ ] Tests for tag listing, filtering, and normalization

## Dependencies
Depends on #13

## Technical Notes
- Implement endpoints in src/app.ts
- Tag normalization logic in SnippetStore
- Use Vitest for tests

issues.title: [Pipeline] Seed Example Snippets & Landing Experience
issues.body:
## Description
Add seed data for a polished first impression. Pre-populate the app with 6+ example snippets across different languages, and ensure the landing page loads with this data immediately.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] src/seed.ts with 6+ example snippets across different languages (TypeScript, Python, Rust, Go, SQL, Bash)
- [ ] Each seed snippet demonstrates real, useful code (not lorem ipsum)
- [ ] Seeds loaded automatically on server start (before listen)
- [ ] Landing page (index.html) loads with seed data visible immediately
- [ ] Tests verifying seed data loads correctly

## Dependencies
Depends on #9

## Technical Notes
- Place seed logic in src/seed.ts
- Load seeds before server listen
- Use Vitest for tests
Related to #9

issues.title: [Pipeline] Create CRUD API Endpoints for Snippets
issues.body:
## Description
Implement REST API endpoints for creating, reading, updating, and deleting code snippets. Ensure all endpoints follow the specified request/response formats and error handling.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] POST /api/snippets ‚Äî create snippet. Body: { title, code, language, description?, tags? }. Returns 201 with snippet. Returns 400 if title or code missing.
- [ ] GET /api/snippets ‚Äî list all. Supports ?language=X and ?tag=X query filters. Returns { snippets: [...], count: N }
- [ ] GET /api/snippets/:id ‚Äî get one. Returns snippet or 404.
- [ ] PUT /api/snippets/:id ‚Äî update. Returns updated snippet or 404. Returns 400 if body empty.
- [ ] DELETE /api/snippets/:id ‚Äî delete. Returns 204 or 404.
- [ ] All error responses: { error: string }
- [ ] Integration tests for all endpoints and error cases

## Dependencies
Depends on #10

## Technical Notes
- Implement endpoints in src/app.ts
- Use Express.js routing
- Use SnippetStore for data operations
- Validate request bodies and handle errors as specified
- Use Vitest for integration tests
Related to #10




> Generated by [PRD Decomposer](https://github.com/samuelkahessay/agentic-pipeline/actions/runs/22384288750) for issue #6

issues.title: [Pipeline] Implement Full-Text Search API for Snippets
issues.body:
## Description
Add a search API endpoint to allow full-text search across snippet content, including title, code, description, and tags. Ensure case-insensitive and partial matching, and proper error handling.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] GET /api/snippets/search?q=term ‚Äî searches title, code, description, tags
- [ ] Case-insensitive matching
- [ ] Returns { snippets: [...], count: N, query: "term" }
- [ ] Returns empty array for no matches (not 404)
- [ ] Returns 400 if q parameter is missing
- [ ] Tests for matching, partial matching, no results, and missing query

## Dependencies
Depends on #13

## Technical Notes
- Implement in src/app.ts
- Use SnippetStore.searchByText for backend logic
- Ensure robust query parameter validation
- Use Vitest for tests
Related to #13

pull_requests.title: [Pipeline] Implement Snippet Data Model & In-Memory Store
pull_requests.body:
Closes #10

## Changes

Implements the data layer for managing code snippets.

- `src/models/snippet.ts` ‚Äî `Snippet` interface with `id`, `title`, `code`, `language`, `description`, `tags: string[]`, `createdAt`, `updatedAt`
- `src/store/snippet-store.ts` ‚Äî `SnippetStore` class backed by a `Map(string, Snippet)` with:
  - `create(input)` ‚Äî generates UUID, sets timestamps
  - `getById(id)` ‚Äî returns snippet or undefined
  - `getAll()` ‚Äî returns all snippets
  - `update(id, input)` ‚Äî patches and refreshes `updatedAt`
  - `delete(id)` ‚Äî removes and returns boolean
  - `searchByText(query)` ‚Äî case-insensitive search across title, code, description, tags
  - `filterByTag(tag)` ‚Äî case-insensitive tag filter
  - `filterByLanguage(language)` ‚Äî case-insensitive language filter

## Tests

```
‚úì src/tests/snippet-store.test.ts  (20 tests) 32ms
‚úì src/tests/health.test.ts  (1 test) 29ms
Test Files  2 passed (2)
Tests  21 passed (21)
```

> **Note**: This PR is built on top of `repo-assist/issue-7-scaffold-express-ts` and should be merged after #7.

This PR was created by Pipeline Assistant.

pull_requests.title: [Pipeline] Create CRUD API Endpoints for Snippets
pull_requests.body:
Closes #13

## Changes

Implements REST API endpoints for creating, reading, updating, and deleting code snippets in `src/app.ts`.

### Endpoints

| Method | Path | Description |
|--------|------|-------------|
| `POST` | `/api/snippets` | Create snippet (body: `title`, `code`, `language`, `description?`, `tags?`) ‚Äî returns 201 or 400 |
| `GET` | `/api/snippets` | List all snippets; supports `?language=X` and `?tag=X` filters ‚Äî returns `{ snippets, count }` |
| `GET` | `/api/snippets/search?q=term` | Full-text search across title, code, description, tags |
| `GET` | `/api/snippets/:id` | Get one snippet ‚Äî returns snippet or 404 |
| `PUT` | `/api/snippets/:id` | Update snippet ‚Äî returns updated or 404/400 |
| `DELETE` | `/api/snippets/:id` | Delete snippet ‚Äî returns 204 or 404 |

All error responses: `{ error: string }`

## Tests

```
‚úì src/tests/snippet-store.test.ts  (20 tests)
‚úì src/tests/health.test.ts  (1 test)
‚úì src/tests/snippets-api.test.ts  (13 tests)
Test Files  3 passed (3)
Tests  34 passed (34)
```

> **Note**: This PR is built on top of `repo-assist/issue-10-snippet-data-model` and should be merged after #10.

This PR was created by Pipeline Assistant.

pull_requests.title: [Pipeline] Add Tag Management API and Full-Text Search API (#11, #14)
pull_requests.body:
Closes #11
Closes #14

## Changes

### Tag Management API (Issue #11)
- Added `normalizeTags()` to `SnippetStore`: normalizes tags to lowercase, trims whitespace, removes duplicates on both `create()` and `update()`
- Added `getAllTags()` method returning `[{ name, count }]` sorted alphabetically
- Added `GET /api/tags` ‚Äî returns `{ tags: [{ name, count }] }`
- Added `GET /api/tags/:tag/snippets` ‚Äî returns `{ snippets: [...], count: N }`

### Full-Text Search API (Issue #14)
- Fixed `GET /api/snippets/search` to include `query` field in response: `{ snippets, count, query }`

### Tests
- `src/tests/tags-api.test.ts` ‚Äî 8 tests covering tag listing, tag-filtered snippets, normalization (lowercase, trim, dedup), and update normalization
- `src/tests/search-api.test.ts` ‚Äî 7 tests covering 400 on missing query, case-insensitive matching, partial matching, no results, description/tag search

### Test Results
All 49 tests pass (5 test files).

This PR was created by Pipeline Assistant.

pull_requests.title: [Pipeline] Build Web UI: Snippet List & Dashboard
pull_requests.body:
Closes #8

## Changes

Implements the main snippet list / dashboard web UI as a set of plain HTML + CSS + JS files (no framework).

### Files Changed
- **`public/index.html`** ‚Äî full responsive layout: header, sidebar, main grid, New Snippet modal
- **`public/css/style.css`** ‚Äî CSS-variable theming, card-based grid, monospace code previews, mobile breakpoints (768 px, 480 px)
- **`public/js/app.js`** ‚Äî client-side logic: fetch-based data loading, language/tag filtering, debounced search, New Snippet form

### Acceptance Criteria Addressed
- ‚úÖ Responsive layout with header, sidebar (language filter + tag cloud), and main content area
- ‚úÖ Snippet cards: title, language badge, first 4 lines of code preview, tag chips, relative timestamp
- ‚úÖ Language filter list in sidebar (populated from snippet data)
- ‚úÖ Tag cloud in sidebar (populated from `GET /api/tags`)
- ‚úÖ Clicking a language or tag filters the list (client-side fetch to API)
- ‚úÖ Debounced search bar (300 ms) calling `GET /api/snippets/search`
- ‚úÖ "New Snippet" button opens modal that POSTs to `GET /api/snippets`
- ‚úÖ Mobile-responsive (CSS breakpoints at 768 px and 480 px)
- ‚úÖ Uses highlight.js (CDN) for code highlighting

### Test Results
All 49 existing tests pass ‚Äî no regressions.

---

pull_requests.title: [Pipeline] Build Web UI: Snippet Detail, Create & Edit Pages
pull_requests.body:
Closes #9

## Changes

### `public/snippet.html` ‚Äî Snippet Detail Page
- Displays title, language badge, full code block with **highlight.js** syntax highlighting (via CDN)
- **"Copy Code"** button with clipboard API + fallback, visual confirmation feedback
- **"Edit"** button links to `edit.html?id=...`
- **"Delete"** button with confirmation dialog (cannot be undone)
- Description rendered as preformatted text
- Tags as clickable chips that link back to the filtered dashboard
- Created/updated relative timestamps + ISO datetime attributes
- Loading and error states handled gracefully

### `public/edit.html` ‚Äî Create & Edit Form Page
- Form fields: title (text, required), language (dropdown with 23 common languages), code (textarea, required, monospace font, **tab key inserts tab**), description (textarea, optional), tags (comma-separated input)
- **Client-side validation** for required fields (title, code) with inline error messages before submit
- Works for **create** (`POST /api/snippets`) when no `?id=` param present
- Works for **edit** (`PUT /api/snippets/:id`) when `?id=` param is set ‚Äî pre-populates form fields from API
- Redirects to `snippet.html?id=...` on successful save
- Error banner for API failures

### `public/js/app.js` ‚Äî Dashboard Update
- Snippet cards are now clickable and navigate to `snippet.html?id=...`
- Tag chip clicks still filter without navigating away

## Test Results
All 49 existing tests pass. No new server-side functionality added (pure UI pages).

---
*This PR was created by Pipeline Assistant.*

pull_requests.title: [Pipeline] Seed Example Snippets & Landing Experience
pull_requests.body:
Closes #12

## Changes

### `src/seed.ts` ‚Äî Seed Data
- 6 real-code snippets across TypeScript, Python, Rust, Go, SQL, and Bash
- Each snippet has a meaningful title, real useful code, description, and tags
- Languages covered: `typescript`, `python`, `rust`, `go`, `sql`, `bash`

### `src/server.ts` ‚Äî Load Seeds on Start
- Calls `seedSnippets(snippetStore)` before `app.listen`, so the landing page loads with data immediately

### `src/tests/seed.test.ts` ‚Äî Test Coverage
- 10 tests verifying: at least 6 snippets, language coverage (all 6), data quality (non-empty fields, tags), and idempotent multiple-call behavior

## Test Results
All 59 tests pass (6 test files):
- `seed.test.ts` (10 tests) ‚úì
- `snippet-store.test.ts` (20 tests) ‚úì
- `snippets-api.test.ts` (13 tests) ‚úì
- `tags-api.test.ts` (8 tests) ‚úì
- `search-api.test.ts` (7 tests) ‚úì
